import './slider.css'; import React from 'react' import argy from '../../utils/images/slider1.avif' import fail from '../../utils/images/slider2.avif' import fighter from '../../utils/images/slider3.avif' import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; // import required modules import { Pagination } from 'swiper/modules'; const Slider = () => { return ( <>
) } export default Slider
